channel.title: Help on a few things
channel.description:
here a list of things I need help on :)
1. taking members off my server 2. change max combat level 3. make a member zone advialbe to everyone 4. adding trimmed skill capes.
thanks for all who helped :)

how do i raise thoes stats too. I did what you told me to do. but it only raised attack and magic how I get hp and stuff?

item.title: Help on a few things
item.dc:creator: @doggyfan24tj doggyfan24tj
item.description:
@doggyfan24tj wrote:

ok snowycards when i am chaning the combat level. I cahnge the return from 100 to 135 and nothing else but when i compile and then run it my attack and magic went to 135 and my combat only to 138 any help on that?

item.title: Help on a few things
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“doggyfan24tj, post:1, topic:166861”]here a list of things I need help on

  1. taking members off my server
  2. change max combat level
  3. make a member zone advialbe to everyone
  4. adding trimmed skill capes.

thanks for all who helped :)[/quote]

1.I’m not good with servers with members,as i haven’t used/made one before.
2.Search dependings on your combat level :

return 99;

That would be if your combat level is 99,if it is 135 search:

return 135;

Also,you might see a code above that saying :

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {

Change that to:

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {

3.Same as number 1.
4.Go to item.java,add the skillcape code into the cape section.

Read full topic

item.title: Help on a few things
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

[quote=“doggyfan24tj, post:1, topic:166861”]here a list of things I need help on

  1. taking members off my server
  2. change max combat level
  3. make a member zone advialbe to everyone
  4. adding trimmed skill capes.

thanks for all who helped :)[/quote]

  1. ok go to player.java, and search for playerIsMemb
    there it will say playerIsMemb = 0
    change that to a 1

  2. open client.java—what is the max skill level in your server? if it is 99 search for this return 99

until you find something like htis

[code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 100; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
    		return lvl;
		}
		}
		return 99;

}[/code]

change the return 99 to whatever number you want (anything higher than 135 will mess up your hp, and give everyone infinite hp)
for example, return 135
REMEMBER, YOUR RETURN NUMBER WILL BE DIFFERENT FOR WHAT YOUR MAX LEVEL IS, for me my max level is 100, so i would look for return 100

  1. ok if you want to get into that zone, you probably have to go from a portal right? so search for the portals object id, and then open client.java and search for case #### the #### should be replaced with the portals object id, and itll probably say something under that like this case #### if (playerIsMemb == 1) { teleportToX = 2123; teleportToY = 3231; sendMessage("Welcome to member zone"); } else if (playerIsMemb == 0) { sendMessage("You must be a member to access this zone"); }

and just take away the if(playerIsMemb) part.

  1. i dont know how to do this… sorry

Read full topic
